description: Returns an array of PolicyComplianceStatus objects. Use PolicyComplianceStatus to get a summary of which member accounts are protected by the specified policy.

parameters.name: PolicyId
parameters.description: The ID of the Firewall Manager policy that you want the details for.

nested_items.name: PolicyOwner
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account that created the Firewall Manager policy.

nested_items.name: PolicyId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Firewall Manager policy.

nested_items.name: PolicyName
nested_items.description: The name of the Firewall Manager policy.

nested_items.name: ComplianceStatus
nested_items.description: Describes an Amazon Web Services account's compliance with the Firewall Manager policy.

nested_items.name: ViolatorCount
nested_items.description: The number of resources that are noncompliant with the specified policy. For WAF and Shield Advanced policies, a resource is considered noncompliant if it is not associated with the policy. For security group policies, a resource is considered noncompliant if it doesn't comply with the rules of the policy and remediation is disabled or not possible.

nested_items.name: EvaluationLimitExceeded
nested_items.description: Indicates that over 100 resources are noncompliant with the Firewall Manager policy.

nested_items.name: LastUpdated
nested_items.description: Timestamp of the last update to the EvaluationResult objects.

nested_items.name: IssueInfoMap
nested_items.description: Details about problems with dependent services, such as WAF or Config, and the error message received that indicates the problem with the service.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If you have more PolicyComplianceStatus objects than the number that you specified for MaxResults in the request, the response includes a NextToken value. To list more PolicyComplianceStatus objects, submit another ListComplianceStatus request, and specify the NextToken value from the response in the NextToken value in the next request.
